about_the_game:
Can't get enough of the relaxing Outpost tracks, or simply want to support development? Here's the solution!
As requested by many users, we're making the Outpost Soundtrack available as a separate purchase, so people who want to support the game, can do so.

As the game expands, you'll receive all new songs via this Soundtrack as well.
